group.headline: 7 TF2 servers & 2 NEW Gary's Mod Server Up - TF2 Servers are Convoy, 2fort, Payload Rotation, Valve Rotation, Back 2 Basics, PUG and Hovel of Tomfoolery
group.summary:
FUG Community Forums

www.FugWorld.com

It's Not FuK World, It's Fug World 8P

7 Servers up Now.......possibly more! 5 of them with HL Stats

2 New Gary's Mod Servers

Sandbox & Custom Gametypes Server: 72.9.144.104:27015

Trouble in Terrorist Town Server: 216.245.206.125:27015

Also Spacebuild Spacebuild 3, LF, Gas Systems FuG Freindly server at:

69.90.34.232:27017



HL Stats Website for TF2 servers is:

http://fugworld.hlstatsx.com/ - Stats Link


Donations are welcome in any amount and are greatly appreciated. All donated money goes into the paying for the servers, upgrades or back into the FuG Community in the form of Giveaways.


A DONATOR PACKAGE is AVAILABLE

The donator package is $ 10.00 for one Month worth of Benefits which includes:

1. Tons of Hats and stuff like capes, glasses and shields. U can add up to 3 items at once to ur character in game.

2. Auto Balance Immunity

3. Different Colors for chat

4 Invulnerability after the round ends, You can't be Killed 8D

5. Evil Glow (Still being Tweaked)
-------------------------------------------------------------------

FuG Community Servers:


***OFFICIAL FUG CONVOY SERVER***

72.9.144.108:27015

***OFFICIAL FUG 2FORT SERVER***

72.9.144.105:27015

***OFFICIAL FUG BACK 2 BASICS SERVER***

72.9.144.106:27015

***OFFICIAL FUG PAYLOAD SERVER***

72.9.144.107:27015


***NEW FUG PUG SERVER***

Pick Up games, Highlander Scrims, Practice & Matches

72.9.144.199:27015


***FUG VALVE ROTATION SERVER***

72.9.144.198:27015

***NEW FUG HOVEL OF TOMFOOLERY***

72.9.144.199:27030


Thank you everyone for ur support. It means so much more than U guys and gals will ever know.

We Love u Guys and Gals - From the start we wanted to make a place where players were respected and knew they were wanted. A place where people could come and forget thier real life problems and have fun with friends and future friends that they meet here. A place where the admins understand that the players should be respected and honored and be treated as such. A place that knows the real value of gaming and that is you, the gaming community, We wanted a place where everybody felt welcome and could be themselves without any racial or real life griefing. A place where everybody knew your name and said hi. Wow - we did do it and we will do it again. We might need some help to get us started again. We did it once........Snood thinks you all know we can do it again. U all are the best bunch of people ever.

We started with one Convoy server.........

Hoping just to get all the old dedicated Convoy 1 players back together. Giving everyone that loves CONVOY 1, a place to hang out, have fun and kill some time while attracting even more players to one of the best TF2 maps ever.

Thanks for all ur support - We do love u all

Thank you

group.headline: Y'all can go to hell.
group.summary:
The wilderness frontier may be dead, but we're not.

If you've somehow encountered this group, its quite likely your life's philosophy boils down to three words - kill or die. Right now, we're a rare type, but at least we're not a dying race.

Feel free to join this group - if you think you can live up to the standard of living longer than the people around you.

group.headline: We now have 9 TF2 servers, 1 L4D2 server, 1 TS Server & 3 NEW Gary's Mod Servers - TF2 Servers are Convoy, 2fort, Payload Rotation, Valve Rotation, Back 2 Basics, DoubleCross, New Mxd Bag, PUG (Comp and HIghlander) & Hovel of Tomfoolery

Thank you everyone for ur support. It means so much more than U guys and gals will ever know.

We Love u Guys and Gals - From the start we wanted to make a place where players were respected and knew they were wanted. A place where people could come and forget thier real life problems and have fun with friends and future friends that they meet here. A place where the admins understand that the players should be respected and honored and be treated as such. A place that knows the real value of gaming and that is you, the gaming community, We wanted a place where everybody felt welcome and could be themselves without any racial or real life griefing. group.headline: Hello Sexy Soldier & Asskicking Rocketmen alike!
group.summary:
The Association of Sexy Soldiers is a group made for the most badass soldiers of TF2.

We're looking for skilled players who make strategic rocket jumping & mid-air rocket kills look easy.

group.headline: Free Frag Network Gaming Community
group.summary:
If you enjoy playing on our servers and have a few bucks to spare please contribute we appreciate any contribution. For a $10 contribution you will receive the following privelages.


1. Colored chat
2. Weapon Glows!
3. Auto-balance immunity
4. Round end protection (Invulnerable after losing a round, and cool super mario disco color)
5. Over 50 different glowing effects, on almost any of your guys body part!

Feel free to use [FFN] tags to show your support for our community. They are for everyone!


Server Rules*


1. No hacking, cheating or exploiting in any way not intended by the map creators or Valve. This also extends to third party programs that enhance your ability to play beyond normal levels (i.e. aimbot)


2. No mic spam. Short clips are fine, but if you are asked to stop, then you must comply. This includes screaming, singing or otherwise making annoying sounds into the mic. Level of annoyance is NOT determined by the creator of the sounds.


3. No discriminatory language. No racism, sexism, etc.


4. No being a douche. This includes disregarding admin requests, circumventing rules, rejoining to get around a mute, griefing other players (blocking snipers views, real world insults, etc)


5. Respect everyone.


*these rules are by no means set in stone, and can be modified at any time for complete and most accurate rules please visit our website freefrag.com
